query.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object type

request.description: Perform a partial update of an Object identified by `{invoiceId}`. `{invoiceId}` refers to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param. Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will be ignored. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.

response.name: successful operation

query.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object type
